Text.val: 27.04.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GB002 by GB902
04.09.2008 SH SCR13901 Added logic to eliminate rounding differences if
abs(amounts) < 0.03, then amounts are set to 0
- First check if a CSTO row exists where CSTO_DATE = GNRL_ACTIEVDATE, if not a
new row has to be stored, which has to be used in the further steps
--- Store new CSTO row with GNRL_ACTIVEDATE
(The calculation of the new stock finance facility has to be performed after
storing the current CSTO row, because BSP005 uses the new values of CSTO)
